title: fatal error: stackfree: bad fixed size
body:
I'm getting a "bad fixed size" error when running tsuru's tests at tip on
darwin_amd64 and linux_amd64.

Output:
https://gist.githubusercontent.com/fsouza/d18a33b9f38568234663/raw/65a457c7533129872e416a458d5f322eb4bd5bac/gistfile1.txt

Unfortunately, I wasn't able to provide a smaller reproducer :(

os/exec works fine in other examples.
